attributes.action: No relocation of prisoners from abroad
attributes.additional_details:
All to often we hear of British Citizens who have committed serious crimes in foreign countries, have been caught, tried and sentenced. Subsequently we hear of their suffering because of the conditions in jails in other countries and they want, in some cases demand, to serve their sentence in the UK because its a better quality of life.

I call upon the Government to refuse all requests to allow any person who has been convicted of committing a crime in a foreign country  to serve their sentence in the UK
